content: when i was a little girl my grandmother gave me a little cradle purse complete with a doll mattress pillow and blanket i don t know if she made the purse or bought it but i remember that it had a plastic bottom cut from an oblong shaped bottle of bleach i loved this little cradle purse and i carried treasures in it well into my teens fast forward to 55 why not revisit this bit of nostalgia so i looked at what was out there and i decided to rework this little treasure in a way that paid homage to the old but all in yarn no hard plastic bits for my babies lolz there are options for an oval bag and a more round bag so depending on your baby s size and shape and your own personal preference work this up the way you would like it to be and use the worsted yarn you like don t feel you have to do like me i am sure your cradle purse will be lovely and fit your personality happy crochet to you *and a little knitting if you d like to make the accompanying blanket not required *
